mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jjdev.samplefile (sample_no, samplefile_path, samplefile_name, samplefile_ext, samplefile_type, samplefile_size, samplefile_date) VALUES (#{sampleNo}, #{sampleFilePath}, #{sampleFileName}, #{sampleFileExt}, #{sampleFileType}, #{sampleFileSize}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT samplefile_no as sampleFileNo, sample_no as sampleNo, samplefile_path as sampleFilePath, samplefile_name as sampleFileName, samplefile_ext as sampleFileExt, samplefile_type as sampleFileType, samplefile_size as sampleFileSize, samplefile_date as sampleFileDate FROM jjdev.samplefile WHERE sample_no = #{sampleNo}
